Name: Ink World
About the game: 'Ink World' is a 2D platform jumping game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells that the protagonist constantly improves his abilities through battles, thereby eliminating many beasts in ancient Chinese legends. [Basic operation] Normal Attack, Skill, Jump, Wall Climbing [Game Features] You need to avoid enemy attacks by rolling or skills, which requires a certain reaction speed. The beautiful Chinese classical art picture will put you in the landscape. Elegant Chinese classical music, the background music is mostly played by Chinese classical instruments such as Guzheng, Pipa and Erhu.
